source_text: Under the Copperhead Sale Agreement, the Company has also granted a 1.5% gross smelter royalty to the Vendor over the Copperhead tenement, which is capped at A$800,000.
additional_details: The royalty is granted by "the Company" (Golden Horse Minerals Limited) to "the Vendor" over the Copperhead tenement. It is capped at A$800,000.
